subsidiary.translation[0].definitions[0]: a company that is owned or controlled by another larger company
a subsidiary of a US company
subsidiary.translation[1].definitions[0]: connected with, but less important than, something else
All other issues are subsidiary to this one.
subsidiary.translation[2].definitions[0]: a company that is at least half-owned by another company
It is important that investors are able to deal with confidence with enterprises from other member states, whether directly, or through their subsidiaries.
Chase Manhattan Bank is a subsidiary of Chase Manhattan Corp.
subsidiary.translation[3].definitions[0]: connected with, but less important than, something
The issue of responsibility is subsidiary to the pressing need to compensate victims.
